charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking around
town and saw Piers with his Obstagoon.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_0200_1:
C’mon, I’m shopping right now. Be patient,
would you?
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_0300_1:
Oi, I said be patient. The music’s not going
anywhere, mate.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_0401_0600_1:
It’s not really that he wants to sing. Rather, he
wants me to sing for him.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_0402_0900_1:
I was in the middle of shopping, but Obstagoon’s
been nagging me to sing.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_1000_1:
He really loves music, so whenever I play music
for him, he gets really happy and rocks out to it.
He makes a lot of noise along with it, too.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_1100_1: He matches it to my singing.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_1200_1: His voice is so metal, I think it’d give you a shock.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_0401_1400_1:
Yeah, sure. Next time we have a battle, we’d be
happy to perform a number for you.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_0402_1600_1:
Yeah. He really rocks out hard, especially
during battles.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_1700_1:
When I sing during a Pokémon battle an’ he gets
all amped up, it’s great.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_1800_1:
But...it’s tough when he wants me to sing when
I’m trying to shop or still working on a new song.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_1900_1: Too much of a good thing can spoil it, y’know?
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_2100_1:
Maybe I can’t cheer someone on just with
the tunes I play. ♪
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_2200_1:
Maybe my songs don’t make anyone happy.
Maybe I can’t help. ♪
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_2300_1:
But still the only thing I can do is sing—sing my
humble song. ♪
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_2400_1: Hm? When did all these people show up?
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_2500_1:
It wasn’t really supposed to turn into an
impromptu outdoor concert...
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_0401_2700_1: Well, I guess it’s kinda nice.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_0402_2900_1:
The only thing a humble singer like me can do is
sing a humble song.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_3000_1:
It’s not that I came to Pasio to have people listen
to my music...
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_3100_1:
But if my being famous makes people want to visit
Galar and Spikemuth, that’d be great.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_3200_1: Come to think of it, this is all thanks to Obstagoon.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_3300_1:
Even when I’m negative, he’s always there
encouraging me.
charaepi_ch0256_00_nezz/2301_1201_3400_1:
He can be needy sometimes, but he’s a solid
partner to have around.
